headline: SPECTRUM AND TEAMSNAP ANNOUNCE EXPANDED SPONSORSHIP TO TRIPLE INVESTMENT IN YOUTH SPORTS
summary: Spectrum, one of the nation's largest broadband connectivity providers, today announced a landmark, multi-year agreement to triple its investment in community sports organizations nationwide by partnering with TeamSnap, the #1 youth sports management platform with 25 million users. Building on the success of a pilot program with TeamSnap, Spectrum will sponsor more than 720 youth sports leagues across the country through 2027, making this collaboration one of the most significant youth sports pa
